Package org.apache.logging.log4j.flume.appender

Apache Flume Appender.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FlumeEventFactory Factory to create Flume events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFlumeManager  
Agent Agent Specification for FlumeAvroAppender.
BatchEvent  
FlumeAppender An Appender that uses the Avro protocol to route events to Flume.
FlumeAvroManager Manager for FlumeAvroAppenders.
FlumeEmbeddedManager  
FlumeEvent Class that is both a Flume and Log4j Event.
FlumePersistentManager Manager that persists data to Berkeley DB before passing it on to Flume.
Log4jEventSource  
 

Package org.apache.logging.log4j.flume.appender Description

Apache Flume Appender. Requires the user specifically include Flume and its dependencies.
